rules.description: G-Layer: Command + HJKL Arrows + N Enter

manipulators.description: G-key activates G-layer, G alone sends G

rules.description: F-Layer: Profile Switcher (F+1=Default, F+2=Cheapino, F+3=Workshop, F+4=Disabled)
Q-Launcher: Hold Q to launch apps
M-Layer new: Mouse Movement & Clicks (Hold M)

manipulators.description: W key activates window management layer
W+K → Shift+Control+Up (Move window to top half)
W+J → Shift+Control+Down (Move window to bottom half)
W+U → Yabai move window to previous display
W+I → Yabai move window to next display
W + Volume Down → Control + F7 (previous display)
W + Volume Up → Control + F8 (next display)

rules.description: CAPS_LOCK to HYPER (SHIFT+COMMAND+OPTION+CONTROL) or ESCAPE (If Alone)

manipulators.description: Avoid starting sysdiagnose with the built-in macOS shortcut cmd+shift+option+ctrl+,
Avoid starting sysdiagnose with the built-in macOS shortcut cmd+shift+option+ctrl+.

from.description: Avoid starting sysdiagnose with the built-in macOS shortcut cmd+shift+option+ctrl+/

rules.description: Shifts Move Forward and Backward by 1 word
Toggle caps_lock by pressing left_shift then right_shift
Open Mission Control by hold tab key
Rotary Knob: Word navigation by default, Volume with Control

manipulators.description: Shift + Volume Down → Shift + Option + Left Arrow (select word left)
Shift + Volume Up → Shift + Option + Right Arrow (select word right)
Command + Volume Down → Ctrl + Shift + Minus (window smaller)
Command + Volume Up → Ctrl + Shift + Equal (window larger)
Volume Down WITHOUT Control → Option + Left Arrow (word left)
Volume Up WITHOUT Control → Option + Right Arrow (word right)

to_if_held_down.shell_command: printf "%s - " "$(date +"%H:%M")" | pbcopy && sleep 0.3 && osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "v" using command down'
printf "%s" "$(date +"%a %d%O, %B, %Y")" | pbcopy && sleep 0.3 && osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "v" using command down'
printf "%s" "$(date +"%Y-%m-%d")" | pbcopy && sleep 0.3 && osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "v" using command down'

rules.description: F-Layer: Profile Switcher (F+1=Default, F+2=Cheapino, F+3=Workshop, F+4=Disabled)
M-Layer new: Mouse Movement & Clicks (Hold M)
M-Layer new: Mouse Movement & Clicks (Hold M)
Rotary Knob: Word navigation by default, Volume with Control

Shift + Volume Up → Shift + Option + Right Arrow (select word right)
Command + Volume Down → Ctrl + Shift + Minus (window smaller)
Command + Volume Up → Ctrl + Shift + Equal (window larger)
Volume Down WITHOUT Control → Option + Left Arrow (word left)
Volume Up WITHOUT Control → Option + Right Arrow (word right)
